section.title: Generating Eclipse Help from DocBook
section.para: The first step in generating Eclipse Help is to download DocBook templates from http://docbook.org, and styles from http://sourceforge.net/projects/docbook/files/docbook-xsl/

section.title: Building Help from DocBook
section.para: Use the ant build file as a template to build the plug-in. You may wish to disable/customise the manifest and plugin.xml generation files.

section.title: Testing the help plug-in
section.para: Since the help is stored in a plug-in is can be run as an Eclipse application and viewed via the Help page.
